评论概述: Compliments every time I wear this
评论详情: Very nice shirt but funny story: I was wearing this shirt for my presentation at a conference. I picked up my name badge went to put it on when I realized it attached via safety pin. I stopped with this shirt in one hand and the pin in the other the moment I realized that this pin will leave a permanent hole in a shirt with this type of satin fabric. I took a moment to contemplate what to do and impulsively thought, “screw it, it’s just a shirt” and went to pin on the name tag. My boss bent closer to me and said, “Don’t do it” right before I made the poke. He was watching this dilemma the whole time and I’m so glad he stopped me. The name tag was not worth the shirt. I get so many compliments on it every time I wear it. 5 stars.

Also the stitching down the center of the blouse was too tight which caused the fabric to bunch up instead of laying flat. I couldn’t steam or iron this out. I’m wearing the blouse under a tan suit so I will keep it but now I’m hesitant to purchase this product again because of the flaws.

I recently added a black satin long sleeve shirt to my wardrobe, and it has quickly become one of my go-to pieces for both day and night wear. The shirt boasts a sleek and elegant design that exudes sophistication, making it a versatile choice for a variety of occasions. The satin material gives it a luxurious feel and a subtle sheen that catches the eye, enhancing the overall appeal of the garment.During the day, this shirt pairs beautifully with jeans or casual trousers for a chic, effortless look. Transitioning to evening wear is a breeze; it looks fantastic with dressier pants or skirts, making it perfect for dinners out or more formal events. The long sleeves add a touch of class and are ideal for cooler evenings, providing both style and comfort.The reason I'm giving this shirt a 4-star review, despite its versatility and style, is that it requires a bit of extra care to maintain its appearance. The satin material can be prone to wrinkling and needs to be handled gently, especially when washing and ironing. This isn't a major drawback, but it's something to consider if you're looking for low-maintenance clothing.Overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase. It's a beautiful, high-quality shirt that elevates any outfit, whether you're aiming for a casual daytime look or something more elegant for the evening. With the right care, it's a piece that can last and remain a staple in your wardrobe for a long time.

I am going to try to sew the entire collar in place,  but that will require a trip to the craft store, where hopefully they will have thread in the correct color.

Thus top looks beautiful and feels lovely! I like the neckline;  it is low enough to look nice but not need an undershirt.
